column4: hello, there are some web pages in flash that I cannot see. However others open easyly, what can I do
the pages you cant view are most likely built in flash 8
there will not be a linux build for flash 8
but I used to use those pages with linux
it could be the page isnt working (you havent given me a page that gives you problems
care to give me them so i can see what the issue is?
ok there you go www.bws.com.pe and http://www.latinka.com/
you cant open that page at all?
I can open but I need the smaill part in flash, but latinka I cannot open
can you give me what version of flash you are using? apt-cache policy flashplugin-nonfree    will give you version
i open them without a problem (find out version) than make sure you are using flash. in browser address bar type about:plugins  and see if flash is there
I can open but I need the smaill part in flash, but latinka I cannot open
check about:plugins see what it says about flash
both pages opened here without a problem with flash installed (forgot to look at source)
